io.soliton.protobuf

Interface ServerLogger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NullServerLogger

    public interface ServerLogger
    Hook interface to allow plugging-in an arbitrary white-box monitoring framework in Piezo.
    Author:
    Julien Silland (julien@soliton.io)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void logClientError(Throwable throwable)
      Logged when the request sent by the client cannot be decoded
      void logLinkFailure(ServerMethod<?,?> serverMethod, Throwable cause)
      Invoked when an error occurred while returning daat to the client.
      void logMethodCall(Service service, ServerMethod<? extends Message,? extends Message> method)
      Invoked when a method call was decoded and is about to be invoked.
      void logServerFailure(ServerMethod<?,?> serverMethod, Throwable throwable)
      Invoked when a method invoked has failed.
      void logServerSuccess(ServerMethod<?,?> serverMethod)
      Invoked when a server has successfully returned a response to the client
      void logUnknownMethod(Service service, String method)
      Invoked when the method sent by the client is unknown
      void logUnknownService(Service service)
      Invoked when the server received a request for an unknown service

      • logMethodCall

        void logMethodCall(Service service,
                 ServerMethod<? extends Message,? extends Message> method)
        Invoked when a method call was decoded and is about to be invoked.
        Parameters:
        service - the service to which the method belongs
        method - the method

      • logServerFailure

        void logServerFailure(ServerMethod<?,?> serverMethod,
                    Throwable throwable)
        Invoked when a method invoked has failed.
        Parameters:
        serverMethod - the method whose invocation failed
        throwable - the cause of the failure

      • logLinkFailure

        void logLinkFailure(ServerMethod<?,?> serverMethod,
                  Throwable cause)
        Invoked when an error occurred while returning daat to the client.
        Parameters:
        serverMethod - the method whose response was being sent
        cause - the cause of the failure

      • logServerSuccess

        void logServerSuccess(ServerMethod<?,?> serverMethod)
        Invoked when a server has successfully returned a response to the client
        Parameters:
        serverMethod - the method that was invoked

      • logUnknownService

        void logUnknownService(Service service)
        Invoked when the server received a request for an unknown service
        Parameters:
        service - the name of the received service

      • logClientError

        void logClientError(Throwable throwable)
        Logged when the request sent by the client cannot be decoded
        Parameters:
        throwable - the cause of the error

      • logUnknownMethod

        void logUnknownMethod(Service service,
                    String method)
        Invoked when the method sent by the client is unknown
        Parameters:
        service - the decoded service
        method - the name of the unknown method
